item.title: Thousand Movie Project
item.description:
“I figure the closest I can get to a couple of rigorous film classes is to watch, in chronological order, every movie on an absurdly long and well-curated list … the book 1001 Movies You Must See Before You Die.”
By Alex Sorondo.
Average 900 words.
item.content:encoded:
“I figure the closest I can get to a couple of rigorous film classes is to watch, in chronological order, every movie on an absurdly long and well-curated list … the book 1001 Movies You Must See Before You Die.” By Alex Sorondo.
